user.account_created_message: Your Terraso account has been created successfully with the following information. You can edit them any time.

group.default_content: Terraso groups connect people with common interests and needs. Explore the groups and join your organizations. Groups exist for people within and across landscapes.
group.form_new_description: You are creating a new group as group manger to connect people with common interests and needs. Groups exist for people within and across landscapes. You can update the group information and manage member list any time.
group.form_description_placeholder: Enter a short description about your group.  (600 characters maximum)
group.form_email_info: This email address will be used by interested people to connect with you and your group.
group.membership_card_description_other: {{count}} Terraso members have affiliated themselves with {{name}}.
group.membership_leave_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to leave {{name}}? The status update may take a few minutes.
group.list_description: View the list of groups in Terraso. Follow the group name link to learn more from the group profile. You can also create a group and invite others to join.
group.list_new_description: Can’t find the organizations or groups you are affiliated with? Create your group in Terraso, so you and your group members can connect in Terraso. The group creator will be the group manager who can add the group information.

landscape.default_content: Explore the landscapes in Terraso and become a member of your landscape. This will help you connect with others on Terraso and lets you share information with other landscape members.
landscape.form_description_placeholder: Enter a short description about your landscape  (600 characters maximum)
landscape.form_email_info: This email address will be used by interested people to connect with you and your landscape.
landscape.form_website_info: This will be publicly displayed to all Terraso users.
landscape.list_description: View the list of Landscapes in Terraso. Follow the landscape name link to learn more from their landscape profile.

terraso_api.error_request_response: Failed to connect with Terraso API

gis.openstreetmap_api_error: Failed to request data from nominatim.openstreetmap.org API
